segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a disgusting mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing with who knows what in that water—grimy and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate but standing in that filthy puddle; how unhygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand in the cookie jar after climbing that dirty stool—nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies will be full of germs now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too; spreading whatever's on her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets, ruining everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's oblivious, letting it all get soaked and spoiled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't clean up this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes near the spill—bound to get contaminated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole sneaky cookie grab feels sneaky and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look without feeling queasy about the slipperiness and dirt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a revolting lack of care for cleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel she's using might be next to get drenched.
segments.speaker: PAR
